name: Random World Culture Quiz | Cultures | 10 Questions

questions.text: The Mabinogion are medieval tales of what culture?
questions.explanation:
Welsh.

	They include the earliest vernacular Arthurian narrative.

questions.text: What is a parfleche, to a Plains Indian?
What is a hammam, to the people of Islamic countries?
The Nahdah was a literary renaissance for which cultural group?
The Ramakien is an epic poem of what people?
What politico-religious movement was named for Ethiopian emperor Haile Selassie?
Other than the New Year festival, what is the other major Japanese cultural and religious festival called?
What Hindu works are also called the Vedanta, or 'end of the Vedas'?
questions.explanation:
upanishads & upanishad.

	They are speculative and mystical scriptures of Hinduism and constitute the final sections of the Vedas.

questions.text: What's the name of the religious sect that flourished in the Balkans between the 10th and 15th centuries who believed that the material world was created by the devil, Christ's older brother?
questions.explanation:
Bogomils.

	They rejected everything that brought man into contact with matter, including marriage, procreation, meat eating, etc. They rejected the organizational structure of the Orthodox Church and the rituals along with it.

questions.text: What essentially are the South American Indian weapons called 'boleadoras' or bola?
questions.explanation:
balls.

	They are stones wrapped up in leather and attached to long ropes used by the native Indians of South America and also by the Gauchos.
